Title: 40867 - # Tips for Choosing the Right Android Phone
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 tips for someone who is shopping for a new Android phone. You can suggest things like reading reviews of phones online, choosing a carrier, comparing prices, deciding what features are important to you and considering things like weight and screen size. Your target audience is interested in technology and looking to get a new Android Phone. You can link to the Target URL by mentioning Android Headlines as a site you use to read reviews on different Android Phones.

Title: 40868 - # Android Gadgets to Get You Through the Summer
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different Android gadgets that will be popular this summer. Your target audience is interested in gadgets and is tech-minded. So write for an audience that is looking to stay up to date on the latest tech trends. You can discuss devices such as new smartphones, smartwatches, tablets, etc. You can link to the target URL by mentioning Android Headlines as a site to use when trying to get the scoop on the latest Android devices.

Title: 40869 - # Android Devices All Techies Need in 2016
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 different Android devices that anyone who is tech-minded would be interested in. Make sure to discuss Android devices that are new this year, or will be coming out this year. You should also make sure to detail the specs and features of these devices. Your target audience is tech-minded people who are interested in staying up to date on the latest technological advances, so write with this in mind. You can link to your target URL by mentioning Android Headlines as a great site for keeping up with all of the latest Android news, as well as reviews on all of Android’s newest devices.
